resources.string: In order to access your portfolio data, myHavelock needs an API key from HavelockInvestments.com.\n\nTap the screen to open the myHavelock Configuration for instructions on how to create and save an API key.
Your portfolio data could not be retreived from HavelockInvestments.com. Please check your internet connectivity and try again.
Trade history data could not be retreived from HavelockInvestments.com. Please check your internet connectivity and try again.
Your API key appears to be invalid. Please confirm your API key in the myHavelock Configuration section and try again.

The Havelock API key you have provided does not have access to your portfolio information.\n\nPlease grant portfolio access permission to your API key, as described in the myHavelock Configuration section, and try again.

Monitor the performance and status of your Havelock Investments portfolio by providing myHavelock with an API key from your HavelockInvestments.com account. This application only reads information about the funds in your Havelock Investments portfolio.
Disclaimer: myHavelock is in no way endorsed by or affiliated with Havelock Investments or The Panama Fund, S.A.
Your portfolio appears to be empty. Once you\'ve purchased shares of any fund on HavelockInvestments.com they will appear right here in myHavelock!
